data.text: I'm so sorry everyone. I've shown you all something so shameful…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>I'm so sorry everyone. I've shown you all something so shameful…

data.text:
Oye, oye, why're you apologizing? You didn't 
cause any issues for us, ya know?
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Oye, oye, why're you apologizing? You didn't 
<story>cause any issues for us, ya know?

data.text:
Plus the Japan Cup has some pretty amazing racers from around the 
globe in it. Coming in 4th ain't that bad.
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Plus the Japan Cup has some pretty amazing racers from around the 
<story>globe in it. Coming in 4th ain't that bad.

data.text:
Y-Yeah! The way you ran today was just as 
mesmerizing as usual, McQueen-san!
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
data.processed:
<story>Y-Yeah! The way you ran today was just as 
<story>mesmerizing as usual, McQueen-san!

data.text:
Anyways, now that the race is over why don't 
we have Trainer treat us to something yummy? 
That won't be a problem, will it Trainer?
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Anyways, now that the race is over why don't 
<story>we have Trainer treat us to something yummy? 
<story>That won't be a problem, will it Trainer?

data.text:
N-Nope! Not a problem at all! McQueen, feel free to eat as much 
as you want now that the Japan Cup is over!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>N-Nope! Not a problem at all! McQueen, feel free to eat as much 
<story>as you want now that the Japan Cup is over!

data.text:
N-Nope! Not a problem at all! McQueen, feel free to eat as much 
as you want now that the Japan Cup is over!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>N-Nope! Not a problem at all! McQueen, feel free to eat as much 
<story>as you want now that the Japan Cup is over!

data.text: I'm… going to have to refuse.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>I'm… going to have to refuse.

data.text:
I have to prepare for the Arima Kinen and I just 
finished that race, so I'm not hungry.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>I have to prepare for the Arima Kinen and I just 
<story>finished that race, so I'm not hungry.

data.text:
Ah, I have to call Grandmother as well. 
I'll be taking my leave then.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Ah, I have to call Grandmother as well. 
<story>I'll be taking my leave then.

data.text: Everyone, I'm… I'm so sorry for today…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Everyone, I'm… I'm so sorry for today…

data.text:
That felt real forced… Anyways, you're 
real bad at acting, ya know?
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>That felt real forced… Anyways, you're 
<story>real bad at acting, ya know?

data.text: I'm sorry. I tried my best, but…
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>I'm sorry. I tried my best, but…

data.text: I'm sorry. I tried my best, but…
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>I'm sorry. I tried my best, but…

data.text:
I was upset with myself for being unsure whether or not I should 
call out to her or just leave her alone for a while.
data.processed:
<story>I was upset with myself for being unsure whether or not I should 
<story>call out to her or just leave her alone for a while.

data.text: I apologize for the intrusion.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>I apologize for the intrusion.

data.text: Ohh! If it isn't Oguri! Did you come to cheer on McQueen!?
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>Ohh! If it isn't Oguri! Did you come to cheer on McQueen!?

data.text: I came to see how the members of my former team were doing.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>I came to see how the members of my former team were doing.

data.text: But it doesn't seem like the star of the show is here.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>But it doesn't seem like the star of the show is here.

data.text: Hmm… it seems like something happened. So what is it?
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>Hmm… it seems like something happened. So what is it?

data.text: I decided to tell Oguri Cap everything that had happened.
data.processed: <story>I decided to tell Oguri Cap everything that had happened.

data.text: I decided to tell Oguri Cap everything that had happened.
data.processed: <story>I decided to tell Oguri Cap everything that had happened.

data.text:
It began with the danger of our team being dissolved, and how we 
overcame that, which also brought in more members.
data.processed:
<story>It began with the danger of our team being dissolved, and how we 
<story>overcame that, which also brought in more members.

data.text:
Due to the lowering of her placement in the much anticipated 
Spring Tenno Sho, she thought that this race was her chance to 
redeem herself. However, she ended up finishing in 4th place.
data.processed:
<story>Due to the lowering of her placement in the much anticipated 
<story>Spring Tenno Sho, she thought that this race was her chance to 
<story>redeem herself. However, she ended up finishing in 4th place.

data.text:
Currently, Mejiro McQueen is like a machine 
with cogs that don't work together.
data.processed:
<story>Currently, Mejiro McQueen is like a machine 
<story>with cogs that don't work together.

data.text: I see… I think I understand how McQueen is feeling.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>I see… I think I understand how McQueen is feeling.

data.text:
She is probably thinking that she has to live up 
to all of the expectations placed on her.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>She is probably thinking that she has to live up 
<story>to all of the expectations placed on her.

data.text: Live up to all of the expectations…?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Live up to all of the expectations…?

data.text: I have been there myself.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>I have been there myself.

data.text:
Having good results in your races breeds high expectations. 
Inevitably, you end up being tied down by said expectations…
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Having good results in your races breeds high expectations. 
<story>Inevitably, you end up being tied down by said expectations…

data.text:
And as these expectations grow they start feeling 
like obstacles to forward progress.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>And as these expectations grow they start feeling 
<story>like obstacles to forward progress.

data.text: These expectations begin feeling like obstacles…
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>These expectations begin feeling like obstacles…

data.text:
The only reason that this team is here today 
is thanks to Mejiro McQueen's efforts.
data.processed:
<story>The only reason that this team is here today 
<story>is thanks to Mejiro McQueen's efforts.

data.text:
Every member of our team joined because of Mejiro McQueen's 
successes, and the only reason that they continue to run is 
because of their admiration for her.
data.processed:
<story>Every member of our team joined because of Mejiro McQueen's 
<story>successes, and the only reason that they continue to run is 
<story>because of their admiration for her.

data.text:
And it isn't only the team members. I too was delighted by Mejiro 
McQueen's performance in her races, and because of that I've 
always had high expectations of her.
data.processed:
<story>And it isn't only the team members. I too was delighted by Mejiro 
<story>McQueen's performance in her races, and because of that I've 
<story>always had high expectations of her.

data.text:
And it isn't only the team members. I too was delighted by Mejiro 
McQueen's performance in her races, and because of that I've 
always had high expectations of her.
data.processed:
<story>And it isn't only the team members. I too was delighted by Mejiro 
<story>McQueen's performance in her races, and because of that I've 
<story>always had high expectations of her.

data.text:
Mejiro McQueen understood all of this, and as such struggled to 
live up to these expectations, alone.
data.processed:
<story>Mejiro McQueen understood all of this, and as such struggled to 
<story>live up to these expectations, alone.

data.text:
During times like this it's your job as a trainer to turn these 
expectations into strength, not into obstacles.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>During times like this it's your job as a trainer to turn these 
<story>expectations into strength, not into obstacles.

data.text: Turn these expectations into strength…
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Turn these expectations into strength…

data.text:
Oguri… How did you turn expectations into 
strength? What did Sensei do to help?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Oguri… How did you turn expectations into 
<story>strength? What did Sensei do to help?

data.text:
Oguri… How did you turn expectations into 
strength? What did Sensei do to help?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Oguri… How did you turn expectations into 
<story>strength? What did Sensei do to help?

data.text: Hmm, while I wouldn't mind telling you…
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>Hmm, while I wouldn't mind telling you…

data.text: You and McQueen have a relationship that is unique to you two.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>You and McQueen have a relationship that is unique to you two.

data.text:
Doing it the same way we did would have no meaning 
to it… or at least that's what I think…
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Doing it the same way we did would have no meaning 
<story>to it… or at least that's what I think…

data.text: A relationship… that is unique to us…
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>A relationship… that is unique to us…

data.text: A relationship… that is unique to us…
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>A relationship… that is unique to us…

data.text:
While I lack the experience and skill that Sensei had, Mejiro 
McQueen has always respected me as her trainer.
data.processed:
<story>While I lack the experience and skill that Sensei had, Mejiro 
<story>McQueen has always respected me as her trainer.

data.text:
While I lack the experience and skill that Sensei had, Mejiro 
McQueen has always respected me as her trainer.
data.processed:
<story>While I lack the experience and skill that Sensei had, Mejiro 
<story>McQueen has always respected me as her trainer.

data.text:
Why does Mejiro McQueen have so much faith 
in me? And what can I do for her…?
data.processed:
<story>Why does Mejiro McQueen have so much faith 
<story>in me? And what can I do for her…?

data.text:
Why does Mejiro McQueen have so much faith 
in me? And what can I do for her…?
data.processed:
<story>Why does Mejiro McQueen have so much faith 
<story>in me? And what can I do for her…?

data.text:
Hehe, that immediate reply… You really haven't 
changed since your days as a sub-trainer.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Hehe, that immediate reply… You really haven't 
<story>changed since your days as a sub-trainer.

data.text: You've always put us before yourself.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>You've always put us before yourself.

data.text:
I see. That's all I can do. Staying by her side, believing in 
her, and supporting her no matter what happens is all I can do!

choices.text: I'm going to go look for McQueen!

data.processed:
<story>I see. That's all I can do. Staying by her side, believing in 
<story>her, and supporting her no matter what happens is all I can do!

data.text:
I see. That's all I can do. Staying by her side, believing in 
her, and supporting her no matter what happens is all I can do!

choices.text: I'm going to go look for McQueen!

data.processed:
<story>I see. That's all I can do. Staying by her side, believing in 
<story>her, and supporting her no matter what happens is all I can do!

data.text:
Hmm… Guess I'll take a look around the shopping district, the 
road to campus, and in front of the train station.
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Hmm… Guess I'll take a look around the shopping district, the 
<story>road to campus, and in front of the train station.

data.text: I'll go check if McQueen-san is somewhere on campus!
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
data.processed: <story>I'll go check if McQueen-san is somewhere on campus!

data.text: I'll go and check around the race course!
data.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
data.processed: <story>I'll go and check around the race course!

data.text: Then I'll go and check around the shrine.
data.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut
data.processed: <story>Then I'll go and check around the shrine.

data.text: This time, our team's ace will rely on us!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>This time, our team's ace will rely on us!

data.text: This time, our team's ace will rely on us!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>This time, our team's ace will rely on us!
